RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Andrй Luнs de Medeiros Santos possui doutorado em Computing Science pela University of Glasgow (1995), e mestrado (1991) e graduaзгo (1989) em Ciкncia da Computaзгo pela UFPE. Atualmente й Professor Titular do Centro de Informбtica da UFPE (CIn-UFPE). Foi Coordenador do Projeto FINEP CInOVE, de estнmulo e suporte а inovaзгo a partir de projetos de pesquisa e ensino desenvolvidos na graduaзгo e pуs-graduaзгo do CIn, e coordena desde 2005 projetos de pesquisa e inovaзгo financiados pela Lei de Informбtica. Foi bolsista de Desenvolvimento Tecnolуgico Nнvel 2 do CNPq de 2012 a 2018. Desenvolve pesquisas em Engenharia de Software e Linguagens de Programaзгo, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: Linguagens de Domнnio Especнfico, Compiladores e Programaзгo Funcional. Foi Diretor do Centro de Informбtica no perнodo de 2013 a 2021, e atualmente й coordenador da Unidade Embrapii CIn-UFPE.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Andrй has a PhD degree in computing Science from the University of Glasgow (1995) and MSc (1991) and BSc (1989) degrees in Computing Science from Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (UFPE). He is currently a Full Professor. He was the coordinator of the FINEP CInOVE Project, which encourages and supports innovation based on research and teaching projects developed at the undergraduate and graduate levels of CIn, and since 2005 coordinates research and innovation projects financed by the Informatics Law. He was a CNPq Technological Development scholarship holder from 2012 to 2018. He develops research in Software Engineering and Programming Languages, working mainly on the following topics: Domain Specific Languages, Compilers and Functional Programming. He was the Director of Centro de IInformбtica (UFPE) from 2013 to 2021, and currently is the coordenator of the Embrapii Unit CIn-UFPE.
